File Selection

Use this dialog box to select files, folders, or directories for an action.

Field Descriptions

Look in Select a valid drive or directory. The contents of the drive or path you select appear in the Contents list.
Opens the directory one level above the current level. This button is disabled if you are at the top level of a directory.
Creates a new folder in the currently selected directory. You may rename the new folder using in-place editing. The following characters are not allowed in new folder names: \ / : * ? " < > | .
Contents list Select a file or directory. To display the contents of a directory, double-click the directory icon. The Look in and Folder/File name fields are updated upon selection.
File/Folder name Use the Look in and Contents list fields to select and display a folder or file name, or enter a path and folder or file name.
